name: Flashlight (Pen Light)
specifications: Pen-sized, battery-operated device with a plastic or metal casing; integrated clip; LED light source; approximately 13–15 cm in length.
function: Used to assess pupil reaction, examine oral or nasal cavities, and illuminate small areas during clinical assessment.
usage: Hold light 15–20 cm from the area to be examined; activate the light just before assessment to avoid startling the patient; check pupil reaction or illuminate the area as needed.
maintenance: Clean with alcohol wipes after each use; avoid shining light directly into eyes for prolonged periods; check batteries regularly.
warning: Holding the light too close or shining it for too long, causing patient discomfort.
